# selectableMapFeatures

**Instance Property**

An array of map features that users can select from the map.

## Declaration

```swift
get selectableMapFeatures(): MapFeatureType[];
set selectableMapFeatures(value: MapFeatureType[]);
```

## Discussion

This is an array of the selectable map features the map displays from the types available in [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapFeatureType].

## Selecting map features

- **selectableMapFeatureSelectionAccessory**: An accessory for displaying place information when a person selects a map feature.
- **annotationForMapFeature**: The method MapKit JS calls when the framework creates a map feature annotation.
